metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5427 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: PowerDNS (aka pdns) Authoritative Server before 3.4.10 does not properly handle a . (dot) inside labels, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (backend CPU consumption) via a crafted DNS query.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
